price: 91. Zo (was het)! En Wij omvatten alles over hem (Dhoel Qarnain).
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
